txt.en: 'We cannot let up, [placeholder]. If we are to defend ourselves and the Riddermark, we must continue to press against the Khundolar. Are you prepared to make another assault upon Lashkarg?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>
'Well done, [placeholder]! We may yet survive this war!'
'You are ready for the attack? I wish you good fortune, [placeholder].'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>

The Khundolar war-camp has become a threat too great to ignore. Something must be done or the Easterlings will overrun Rohan.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>
Talk to Céola when you are ready to assault Lashkarg

Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.

You should speak with Céola when you are ready to depart for Lashkarg.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should return to Céola with news of your victory at Lashkarg.
